Kayako - ticket id 60214613 // Raymond Guirguis commented publicly: Dear Andrew,

Thank you for your patience.

We have updated the automation backend on our end to onboard the company: 104983
Admin users can now perform automated admin actions through ATLAS chatbot, including the following:
➕ Add New Device
🔄 Reassign Device to Worker (in same company)
❌ Delete Device
🔑 Retrieve PIN for Activation
📊 Device count and License details

It is also recommended to onboard all other FFM companies in bulk, rather than responding to individual company issues like the above.
To proceed with the onboarding of other companies in bulk, please provide the following:

	* Please update these two fields for each company — “StreetSmart License Count” and “StreetSmart CompanyID” (unless the license is managed through 2Checkout, in this case, we just need the 2checkout reference number for each companyID to enable its automation).
	* Let us know the list of CompanyIDs which are recently updated on Salesforce, in order to onboard them on our backend (once the license information is in place). 

Looking forward for your feedback.

Best regards,
Raymond Guirguis
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60214613 // Raymond Guirguis commented publicly: Dear Andrew,

The ATLAS automation for this customer is currently not functioning because the required Salesforce fields that store license data are not populated. 

These two fields — “StreetSmart License Count” and “StreetSmart CompanyID” — are essential for the automation to retrieve the license and device counts (unless the license is managed through 2Checkout, in this case, we just need the 2checkout reference number for each companyID to enable its automation).
You can view and populate them directly in Salesforce at the following link: https://trilogy-sales.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/0012x00000A4hSzAAJ/view

These fields are currently not populated:
image

Please update these two fields for this customer, and ideally for all FFM and new customers to ensure smooth onboarding.
Once completed, kindly share the list of companyIDs that were updated — we’ll then proceed with completing the onboarding steps on the CS side to activate automation through the ATLAS chatbot.

Thank you for your help in moving this forward.

Best regards,
Raymond Guirguis
StreetSmart Support Team

Kayako - ticket id 60214613 // Raymond Guirguis commented privately:  The answer would depend on the level of details you wanna get into.. 
 For the above ticket for instance, the message says: 0 active devices and 0 licensed, so will focus on these only. 
 Normal flow: 

 	* a company admin enters ATlas chat, the bot will check his email through this mapping sheet: API - Streetsmart - GetCoID v2, [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Absz90TWyFAlC5fy-YVKnDdeEECHTOrEqVjbXk_75mY/edit?usp=sharing] if found, Atlas will show the company ID to the user and allow admin actions. So if a customer doesnt get the admin options, you just need to add his email in this sheet (which is not the issue here, since he got the admin menu (as per the other ticket linked here, correct COID is 104983). 

	* To get count of active licenses , bot searches 2 places:  

 	* Salesforce using the 2 fields shared on the ticket (this requires no onboarding effort from CS, should be done by BU),
example from another customer:
image

 	* then 2checkout, using a mapping Dynamo DB table (this requires onboarding effort for FFM or new companies, you can contact me for more details).

 	* To get count of active devices, we use the same mapping Dynamo DB table (this requires onboarding effort for FFM or new companies). From that mapping table, Chatbot API gets the creds of an API user which has access to check active devices count, and add devices.

 So based on the errors in the ticket, we have 2 issues here: 
1. SF is not populated with the 2 fields mentioned, we need to ask BU to populate it.
https://trilogy-sales.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/0012x00000A4hSzAAJ/view
image 
 2. This companyID is not onboarded on Dynamo DB. You can let me know if you need to add one or more company IDs which need to be onboarded, and I can onboard them, preferably in bulk. 

 Note that we requested the same from BU side many times before, last time was 24th Sep, in a mail thread with saurish.savant@ignitetech.com. 

 Will get back to requester, hoping he could help with the task from BU side .

Kayako - ticket id 60214613 // Shaquille De Lancy commented publicly: Dear Andrew,

Thank you for contacting the StreetSmart Support Team. We understand that the customer Florida Department of Health is unable to add devices using ATLAS.
We note that, at least partially, this issue is due to StreetSmart-specific fields on the customer's Salesforce instance [https://trilogy-sales.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/0062x000008o1lQAAQ/view] not being set. Specifically, the "StreetSmart License Count" and "StreetSmart CompanyID" fields.
As an example, see the Graybar customer account [https://trilogy-sales.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/0012x00000lpPvCAAU/view] with StreetSmart-specific fields filled.

While automation-related concerns are resolved, the customer can reach out to the Support Team to provide line numbers and request manual provisioning; it seems that the customer is in the process of this on ticket #60211680 [https://central-supportdesk.kayako.com/agent/conversations/60211680].
Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Shaquille De Lancy
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.
